skill_e.tooltip:
Passive: Attacks deal ? bonus magic damage.

Active: Kayle's next attack becomes ranged and deals ? of the target's missing health as bonus magic damage. This attack upgrades when Kayle reaches Level ?, causing it to explode when it hits the target, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Movement Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

skill_q.tooltip:
Kayle summons a celestial sword that stops on the first enemy hit.

The sword deals ? magic damage to the target and enemies behind it, slows by ?% for ? seconds, and shreds Armor and Magic Resistance by ?% for ? seconds. Radiant Blast refunds ?% of its mana cost for each champion hit.

skill_r.tooltip:
Kayle makes an allied champion invulnerable for ? seconds.

Then, after a cast time, she purifies the area around them dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Kayle and target allied champion are healed for ? health and gain ? Movement Speed for ? seconds.
